name: Social AI
description: 1)The project is Social AI, a cryptocurrency project that aims to create a decentralised social media platform built on the Binance Smart Chain. The platform will offer a social-to-earn system, which rewards members for engaging with their friends and the community. Users will be able to earn passive income for every like, post, and comment they make on the platform. 2)The Social AI project is unique because it offers a decentralised social media platform with a social-to-earn system that rewards users for their engagement. Additionally, it combines the benefits of a decentralised social media network with the power of cutting-edge AI technology, providing users with an unparalleled user experience. 3)The Social AI project was launched in 2023 on the Binance Smart Chain. It aims to provide a secure, private, and rewards-based decentralised social media platform using blockchain technology and AI-powered features. The project's goal is to revolutionise the social media industry by offering a unique user experience that integrates with people's daily lives.
